comment: Feels like high school all over. Will take 25 points out of ur final overall  grade if u leave during class. Will not let you in to the class if you are late to class. lectures are confusing and boring. She talks in old English.

The class may swell be an English class graded more so on how well you write than on your knowledge of topics. She makes things overly difficult and studying for her test is a nightmare because you have to dig to find the material. The lectures are only 50 minutes but they feel like an eternity.
